item.title: Drupal Coda Clips
item.description: Dezinerfolio's free Drupal snippet library for the Coda editor (Mac OS only) provides a very useful set of code clips for theming Drupal sites. http://www.dezinerfolio.com/freebie/drupal-coda-clips
